2019 MANAGING A SALES TEAM TRAINING PROGRAM
You or a member of your team has been selected to participate in the upcoming
Sales Leadership Training Program: Managing a Sales Team.
The Managing a Sales Team Training is scheduled for the week of September 23rd, 2019 and will be hosted at our WEX Training location in Maine. More information will be communicated specific to the training agenda and logistics as soon as everything is finalized. In the meantime, please review the information below to prepare yourself for the upcoming event.
Important: This is a required training program for all sales managers. If for any reason you cannot participate in this training event, please contact your direct manager and notify me as soon as possible. This program is only hosted once a year and we are committed for payment for # of attendees. Due to the size of this group, I will need to know your attendance by August 9, 2019.
If travel is required, use the information below to make travel arrangements to participate in this training event. September is a favorite tourist travel destination in Maine, so please make hotel arrangements as soon as possible.
Travel Dates:
Arrive in Maine anytime on Sunday, September 22nd, 2019 Depart anytime on Friday, September 27th, 2019
Hotel Suggestions:
Marriott Sable Oaks – South Portland, Maine (This is close to the training facility and airport. Shuttle service is provided by the hotel) Courtyard Marriott – Portland, Maine (This is downtown Portland and approx. 20 minutes from the office. Shuttle service is NOT provided, therefore you will need a rental car or Uber) Press Hotel – Portland, Maine (This is downtown Portland and approx. 20 minutes from the office. Shuttle service is NOT provided, therefore you will need a rental car or Uber) AC Hotel – Portland, Maine (This hotel is downtown Portland and right next to the new WEX Home Office, shuttle service provided by WEX to South Portland for training or you can Uber)
Please contact me if you have any questions on making Hotel arrangements.
Meals:
Coffee only will be provided each morning in the Training Room from 8:00AM to 8:30AM An AM and PM snack and beverage will also be available Lunch will be provided by on site vendor Dinner will be on your own with the exception of a group dinner scheduled for Tuesday, September 24th 2019.
Important: If you have any dietary needs or concerns please notify Kathryn Connolly at Kathryn.Connolly@wexinc.com so I can make alternate arrangements.
Managing A Sales Team Training Objectives:
Develop and strengthen personal leadership and communication skills Build and coach to success a strong, productive sales team Understand and apply a variety of approaches to motivate others Inspire and harness creativity and fluency of ideas Define clear performance expectations and manage accountability
